original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and gold that they had stored in the Lord's temple and in the king's palace. He sent it to Ben-Hadad, king of Syria, who lived in Damascus. Chronicles 15 Chronicles 17
korean_text: 아사가 여호와의 전 곳간과 왕궁 곳간의 은금을 내어다가 다메섹에 사는 아람 왕 벤하닷에게 보내며 이르되

sentences.original_text: Then Asa took all the silver and gold
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 아사는 모든 은과 금을 가져갔다

sentences.original_text: that they had stored in the Lord's temple
